auth._context_mfa_required: Page heading shown when user must complete MFA to proceed
auth.mfa_verification_required: MFA verification required to access your account
auth._context_complete_mfa_verification: Primary button text to submit MFA verification

security._README: ⚠️ SECURITY-CRITICAL: Messages prevent information disclosure. See src/locales/SECURITY-TRANSLATION-GUIDE.md
security.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please verify your credentials and try again.
security.rate_limited: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
security.session_expired: Session expired. Please log in again.
security.recovery_code_not_found: Recovery code not found. Please verify you entered it correctly.
security.recovery_code_used: This recovery code has already been used. Each code can only be used once.
security.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
security.internal_error: An error occurred. Please try again.

_meta._purpose: These messages follow OWASP/NIST guidelines to prevent information disclosure. Translations MUST maintain generic wording to prevent credential enumeration and timing attacks. Never reveal: which credential failed, precise timing, account existence, or attack progress.

authentication_failed.security_note: MUST NOT reveal which credential failed (password, OTP, or recovery code). This prevents attackers from determining valid credentials or enumerating accounts.
authentication_failed.owasp_ref: ASVS 2.2.2 - Authentication failure responses must be generic

rate_limited.security_note: MUST NOT reveal precise lockout duration, attempt counts, or remaining attempts. This prevents timing attacks and progress tracking.
rate_limited.owasp_ref: ASVS 2.2.1 - Account lockout must not be timing-based enumerable

session_expired.security_note: Safe to indicate session issue as it doesn't reveal credential information. Helps users understand they need to re-authenticate.

recovery_code_not_found.security_note: Safe to indicate recovery code context as user explicitly selected this authentication method. Does not reveal whether code exists.

recovery_code_used.security_note: Safe expected behavior message. Users need to know recovery codes are single-use to prevent confusion.

MUST_translate_as: Generic rate limit message (no precise timing)
_translation_guidelines.WHY: These restrictions prevent attackers from: (1) determining valid usernames/emails, (2) knowing which credential to focus attacks on, (3) conducting timing attacks, (4) measuring attack progress

_safe_information.format_requirements: Safe to specify format rules (e.g., 'OTP must be 6 digits')
_safe_information.expected_behavior: Safe to describe how features work (e.g., 'Codes expire every 30 seconds')
_safe_information.recovery_options: Safe to offer alternatives (e.g., 'Use a recovery code instead')
_safe_information.general_guidance: Safe to provide help (e.g., 'Check your authenticator app')

magicLink.title: Sign in with Email
magicLink.description: We'll send you a secure login link
magicLink.sentTo: We sent a login link to {email}
magicLink.linkExpiresIn: This link will expire in 15 minutes
magicLink.noPasswordNeeded: No password needed — just click the link in your email
magicLink.requestFailed: Failed to send login link. Please try again.
magicLink.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your link

webauthn.signIn: Sign in with Face ID / Touch ID
webauthn.notSupported: Biometric authentication is not supported in this browser
webauthn.requiresModernBrowser: Please use a modern browser that supports WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge)
webauthn.setupFailed: Failed to set up biometric login
webauthn.authFailed: Biometric authentication failed. Please try again.
webauthn.description: Use your fingerprint, face, or security key to sign in
webauthn.supportedMethods: Supports Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, and security keys

lockout.account_locked: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts
lockout.contact_support: Contact support if you need immediate access
lockout.try_password_reset: You can reset your password instead

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this session?
sessions.confirm_remove_all: This will log you out from all other devices. Are you sure?
sessions.removed_all_success: All other sessions have been logged out

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.setup_description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
mfa.scan_qr: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.verify_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
mfa.invalid_code: Invalid code. Codes expire every 30 seconds. Try the latest code from your authenticator app.
mfa.password_reason: Confirm your identity to modify two-factor authentication settings
mfa.cancel: Cancel and return to sign in
mfa.protected_description: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
mfa.enable_description: Protect your account with an additional layer of security
mfa.benefit_unauthorized: Prevent unauthorized access even if your password is compromised
mfa.benefit_apps: Works with Google Authenticator, Authy, and other TOTP apps
mfa.benefit_recovery: Backup recovery codes for emergency access
mfa.supported_apps: Use Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP app
mfa.enter_code_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.enter_recovery_code: Enter one of your recovery codes
mfa.enter_all_digits: Please enter all 6 digits to continue

recovery_codes.title: Recovery Codes
recovery_codes.description: Save these codes in a safe place. Each can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator.
recovery_codes.warning: These codes will only be shown once
recovery_codes.save_required: You must download or copy your recovery codes before completing setup.
recovery_codes.generate_new_warning: This will invalidate all existing recovery codes
recovery_codes.copy_failed: Failed to copy codes to clipboard
recovery_codes.usage_hint: Each code can only be used once. Regenerate codes if you're running low.
recovery_codes.generate_success: New recovery codes have been generated
